title: What Happened With Savannah Guthrie Mom's Suspect's Glove?

title: Batista Lab Study Reveals How Local Antibody Feedback Regulates B Cell Competition and Promotes Immune Diversity
desc: A collaborative study published in Immunity from the Batista Lab and Liu Lab at the Ragon Institute, together with the Schief Lab at Scripps Research Institute, has uncovered a previously unrecognized mechanism that shapes how immune cells are selected during an immune response. title: Actress Kemity Denies Trading Sex for Movie Roles
desc: Nollywood actress Kemisola 'Kemity' Apesin addresses rumors, stating she never traded sexual favors for movie roles and built her career on hard work.

title: FACT FOCUS: False claims the Trump Administration made about climate change and energy
desc: While announcing that he was rolling back the Environmental Protection Agency’s 2009 endangerment finding, President Donald Trump and EPA Administrator Lee Zeldin made false claims regarding the government declaration, climate change and energy.

title: Settlers smash cars in West Bank after Palestinian attack
desc: According to reports, Palestinians approached an illegal farm established by Jewish settlers on private land in Area B of the West Bank. Police told KAN that dozens of Palestinians attacked the farm.

desc: Stocks rose on Friday after a crucial inflation report showed prices rose less than expected last month.

title: Raptors waive G Chris Paul, open up roster spot
desc: Paul was acquired by Toronto ahead of last week's NBA trade deadline in a three-team swap that sent Ochai Agbaji to the Brooklyn Nets and got the Raptors under the luxury tax line.
